content.rendered:
Nowaste Logistics AB has entered into an agreement with KNAPP regarding the manufacturing, installation and commissioning of a new automated warehouse system in Helsingborg. The automated warehouse system will be operated on a stand-alone basis for an individual customer. The project is an outcome of the increasing demand for efficient transport and logistics solutions in the e-commerce market.

Nowaste Logistics AB is part of the Total Produce Nordic Group and is active in the management and operation of warehouse systems. On behalf of its customers, Nowaste Logistics AB currently manages a product value exceeding SEK 8.5 billion in existing warehouse facilities.

The KNAPP group, based in Austria, is a European supplier of high technological warehouse systems.

Nowaste Logistics AB was represented by Mannheimer Swartling.
